runs.comm: Welcome back Nehra. Four first ball. Gentle, short, on the pads, and short-armed away past square leg
short and wide, Finch gets a bottom edge on the cut. Perhaps not wide enough
short of a length, outside off, Finch looks to flick it to leg. Is beaten on the outside edge
short of a length, on the pads, some swing back in, hits him on the pad as he looks to work it across the line
Finch looks to pull, but the ball is not short enough, and hits him on the thigh pad
appeal for lbw but this is pitched outside leg and beats Finch's attempt to work it to leg
Finch makes room and chips a flat ball from outside leg over mid-off
fired in, moves from leg to off, not sure if it is a carrom ball. Punched to mid-off
Finch is backing away, Ashwin is following him, and this time Finch gets all of it and sends it flying over cover for four
this time he doesn't back away, but Ashwin keeps firing down leg. Goes for a wide. Well done by Dhoni with the collection
well bowled by Ashwin. Slows it down with Finch making room. His chip shot goes towards vacant long-off, Jadeja from long-on can't quite make it
swiped across the line for couple wide of long-on

and Finch has got stuck into Ashwin. This is just a touch too full, allowing Finch the confidence to go ahead with the shot over the off side even though he has backed away a long way. Finally he makes a sweet connection too. Six over wide mid-off
short of a length, outside off, punched to cover
short, chest high, Warner is on his toes on the pull, and sends it in front of midwicket for four
don't bowl waist-high short balls to Warner on a field with short square boundaries. Easy six there
length ball, holds its line outside off, goes off the thick outside edge to square third man for one
short of a length, on off, punched away to extra cover
short of a length, slower, punched away to deep square leg
big big appeal Short of a length, from wide on the crease, Finch plays across the line is beaten, but is hit on the top of the pad
short of a length, wide on the crease, seam movement in, beats the inside edge, goes through to Dhoni. Good start from Bumrah
wide on the crease again, Finch looks to play him to leg, but has his inside edge beaten. Not getting used to the pace of Bumrah
length ball, angling in towards top, pushed to the right of mid-off for one
down the wicket, hits it clean straight to mid-off. Takes the single, but a powerful throw in from Pandya. That looks like some arm even though he has missed
down the wicket, works a length ball wide of mid-on for a single
short of a length, not much room, punched to point
short of a length, slower ball, punched to mid-on for one
lucky, really lucky. Down the leg side with a short fine leg inside the circle. He is really lucky Warner has hit this straight to that man
slower ball, middle and leg, Warner makes room to go inside-out, over point, for four
full, middle and leg, dug out towards deep square leg for one
Finch makes room and sends a length ball over mid-off for four. Timed perfectly

Bumrah has the wicket. He has clearly looked like India's most impressive bowler. Just difficult to read his pace with that unorthodox action. Warner sees a short ball, looks for the pull, but it hurries on to him, and he drags it from outside off and is caught at mid-on
and Smith gets a four first ball. Just moves inside the line and tucks this off the hip, fine of short fine leg
short of a length, Smith stays back to pull it, but times it straight to short midwicket
short, a touch too short, Smith moves right across to pull this from wide outside off. He has beaten square leg with ease
quicker ball, cramps him up as Smith is looking to make room. Hits this straight to mid-on
pulled from outside off, gets a single to deep square
chipped wide of long-on for two
works this from outside off for a single to leg
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, but he has defended it well
cut in front of deep cover for two
length ball, on off, goes back to cut it in front of deep cover again, but this time the batsmen nearly run into each other, which means they get just the one
full and straight, dug out to long-on for one
starts with a wide down the leg side
short of a length, down the leg side again, and is another wide
another wide down the leg side. This time fuller
short of a length, goes down the leg side, but not called wide this time, because it has started from around off. it has kissed the shirt too
length ball, middle and leg, flicked away wide of long leg for two
short of a length, outside off, 136ks, punched to deep cover
Finch manhandles Pandya. Down the wicket and cuts him in front of square for a flat six. Short square boundary at play
wide down the leg side again. Short of a length and headed down. Bowled at 136ks
short of a length, drops it towards midwicket for one
that is a wide too. This time on height. Tries the bouncer, but at his pace you have to go really short to bowl a difficult bouncer. Too high
finally the over ends. Eleventh ball of the over. Pulled over midwicket for four. Nervous over from Pandya
short of a length, on off, punched to point
not the best timing but good placement. Makes room to slug this length ball in the air but wide of long-off
stays back to a wide length ball, gets a single to deep cover
full, on off, clipped to long-on for one
on a length, on the pads, worked to deep square leg

Smith gets a long send-off from Kohli. Smith looks to work this to leg, gets a massive leading edge to extra cover where Kohli takes the catch and gives it to Smith. Seems to be suggesting Smith had been chirping (perhaps when batting or when Kohli was batting)

not given out because Ashwin came in the way. This looks pretty straight as Finch is beaten on the big sweep, but the umpire says I can't give this because you are in my way. Turns out Finch has got a bottom edge

the umpire didn't get to watch the previous delivery so Finch gives him an action replay sans the inside edge. He moves well across the stumps to try to sweep an offbreak, and is beaten again. Pitches within, straightens to hit middle. Dead plumb. Not so sure about the replay that is showing it pitched outside leg. That shake right at the last moment makes it look not right
nice turn, from around off, turning back to middle and leg, takes the inside edge
worked down the ground for a single
offbreak, middle and leg, dropped to leg for a single to get off the mark
flat offbreak, middle and leg, defended back to him
short of a length, no room, defended to leg
flat, short of a length, no room, defended
moes inside the line to work a length ball to leg for one
round arm, on off, really full, pushed to cover
flat, on off, pushed wide of cover for one

Jadeja has got another wicket. India have Australia where they want them. Like rabbits in headlights against spin. Head has not got a loose ball so far and tries to manufacture a sweep. Misses. Looks pretty dead. The umpire has no hesitation. Replays show impact is outside off. He has got himself outside the line of off
short and wide, cut away to deep cover
short of a length, slow, bunted into the leg side for one
short of a length, punched to long-off for one
turn. Yuvraj slows it down, gets turn from middle and leg towards off. Defended back to him
the short square boundary in play. Short ball from Yuvraj, Watson has toe-ended the pull for a flat six just over the rope
full, driven down the ground for one
on a length, on off, pushed to long-off for one
makes room to cut this to deep point for one
wide length ball, driven to deep cover for one
makes room to go into the off side, but gets just the single to deep cover
he is shaping up for the big sweep, but Jadeja is flat and he can't get under it. Hit to point
gets the sweep but gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and nearly holes out to Kohli at long-on. Takes a single on the bounce
swept away for one
moves across to sweep, would have got a wide down the leg side had he not mis-hit this for one

Nehra takes the nervous catch. India must think they are home and dry. Watson, under pressure, goes for the big sweep, and Ashwin's bounce takes the top edge. It is a skier, and Nehra somehow manages to never look comfortable under those. At short fine leg, he makes many a heart skip a beat before pouching this
short of a length, across him, beats the cut
pushed down to long-on for one
paddle-sweeps this from middle and leg for a single
short, chest high, pulled down to long-on for one
he has hit this into the road. What an age we are living in. Looked like he couldn't spin two minutes ago, but has monstered this medium pace for a six over long-on. Just a hit-me length ball
wide length ball, drilled to deep cover, Kohli fields excellently, Lynn comes back for two. He sees a good throw, and dives in to make his ground
tries to go full and wide out of his reach. Too wide, though. Called
wide length ball again. This would have been a wide had Lynn not drilled it to wide cover for one. One bounce to Kohli
goes across the stumps to look for a ramp, the slower ball beats him, but they get a single

Pandya has his wicket. The wide line has worked. This is another wide he has ruined. Second time in this over he has gone and played a delivery that would have been called a wide. The last time he nearly got caught at deep cover, this time he finds extra cover. Yuvraj takes an overhead catch. This seems to have hurt his hands, but Yuvraj has taken it nonetheless
full, middle and leg, driven to long-off for one
full, on the pads, worked away for the single
full, on off, driven to deep cover. They take just one despite Pandya's misfield
short of a length, punched to deep cover for one
flatter delivery, could have hit this past pint, but finds that man. Gets just the single
full, on off, hit back to Ashwin. Another good over of spin
Pandya is on a hat-trick. Slower ball, on a length, in the slot, Wade looks to go for a six but skies it. Jadeja takes it calmly at deep midwicket
low full toss, hit to deep cover for one
well bowled. Yorker just inside the tram line on the off side. Squeezes it under the bat
another wide ball disturbed by an Australian batsman. Dug out to point, and Ashwin shies at the stumps and gives away four overthrows. Can't blame Ashwin. Poor backing up from square leg

this is seriously ordinary cricket from Australia. Richardson has borrowed a ladder from somewhere and reached this wide ball to take a single. Almost like they are worried about India's over rate. Just going out of their way to play every wide Pandya is bowling
another wide played at. Faulkner gets a single off the edge
wide down the leg side. Now this you can't play even if you want to
slower ball, Faulkner has picked it early and slog-swept it over midwicket for six. Short square boundary. Works for Faulkner
and Bumrah has come back with a replay of how he dismissed Faulkner in the ODI. Yorker, at the stumps, and Faulkner looks to sweep, and is bowled. Game, set and match
yorker, middle and leg, dug out for one
full and straight, driven to long-off for one
slower ball, would have been a wide had he not tried to ramp this. Gets a single to short fine leg
yorker, just outside off, dug out for one
slower ball, full, hit towards long-on
full and straight, Richardson mows across the line, Nehra hits the off stump
short of a length, outside off, slower ball, left alone
short of a length, angling in to cramp him up. Beats the inside edge
slower ball, short outside off, cut away to deep point
slower full ball, driven to long-off for one
makes room to try and hit over cover, is beaten outside off
moves well across the line to try to work it to fine leg, is beaten, and somehow Bumrah misses the stumps
all over. The debutants combine to get Boyce out. Bumrah does him in with the slower ball, Pandya takes an easy catch at mid-off. Eventually a comfortable win for India
